queries.read: select symbol, yahoo_symbol from job_list where (close_current_asof is null or close_current_asof < curdate()) and enabled = 'Y';
select j.symbol, j.include_all_roots, t.weekly_symbol from job_list j left join tradier_weekly_symbol t on j.symbol = t.symbol where j.get_options = 'Y';
select symbol, yahoo_symbol from job_list where (volume_current_asof is null or volume_current_asof < curdate() - interval 1 day) and enabled = 'Y';
queries.read_single: select * from historical_prices where symbol='{symbol}' and close_date='{close_date}';
queries.write: insert into historical_prices (symbol, close_date, open, high, low, close, volume) values ('{symbol}', '{close_date}', {open}, {high}, {low}, {close}, {volume}) on duplicate key update open=values(open), high=values(high), low=values(low), close=values(close), volume=values(volume)

insert into historical_options_prices ( symbol, option_symbol, trade_date, description, option_type, strike, bid, ask, open_interest, expiration_date ) values ( '{symbol}', '{option_symbol}', '{trade_date}', '{description}', '{option_type}', {strike}, {bid}, {ask}, {open_interest}, '{expiration_date}') on duplicate key update bid=values(bid), ask=values(ask), open_interest=values(open_interest)
update job_list set close_current_asof='{date}' where symbol='{symbol}';
update job_list set volume_current_asof='{date}' where symbol='{symbol}';
